author: Suignard, Philippe and Cailliau, Frederik and Cavet, Ariane
title: La longueur des tours de parole comme critère de sélection de conversations dans un centre d'appels (Turn-taking length as criterion to select call center conversations) [in French]
booktitle: Proceedings of the Joint Conference JEP-TALN-RECITAL 2012, volume 2: TALN
